other_tests.findings: High serum fluoride of 220 µg/liter (20–80 normal)
24-h urine collection contained 3.5 mg/liter fluoride (0.2–3.2 normal), excreting a high level of urine fluoride of 12.3 mg fluoride/day (3.5 mg/liter)
Fingernail fluoride level of 11.78 mg/kg, which was among the highest recorded
Toenail fluoride level of 2.76 mg/kg, elevated compared with controls
Demonstrated a 'superscan' with increased skeletal radioisotope uptake and absence of activity in the kidneys, consistent with metabolic bone disease

After 8 weeks of ergocalciferol: 25OHD was 11 ng/ml, calcium 9.0 mg/dl, phosphorus 3.8 mg/dl, alkaline phosphatase 288 IU/liter, bone-specific alkaline phosphatase 96 ng/liter, osteocalcin 309 ng/ml, and PTH 203 pg/ml
other_tests.changes_over_time: A downward trend in serum osteocalcin from 309 to 266 ng/ml was noted, and urine N-telopeptide of type I collagen/creatinine decreased from 519 to 495 nM

other_tests.findings: 25OHD level was 62 ng/ml (30–80 normal), PTH level was 196 pg/ml
